title: Electrochemical Microlearning: Instructional Design Process Integrated with EC Lab

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational chemistry and physics knowledge, including basic concepts of electrochemistry
context.additional_context: Graduate-level social sector learners, emphasizing practical application skills through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can utilize key features of electrochemical experimental equipment (EC Lab) with 90% accuracy in a mobile environment.
Learners can analyze core electrochemical phenomena such as ion migration and electro-polarization through simulations and produce quantitative reports.
Learners achieve a completion rate of over 80% by selecting microlearning content tailored to their learning styles (auditory/kinesthetic).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
